main event: A round object, the color of gold, was observed over Caribou, Maine, for about 5-15 seconds.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a 10 cent piece but appeared very bright like the sun, The object was observed by the witness and his wife, who estimated its altitude to be between 10,000-20,000 feet, The object changed speed rapidly and disappeared from sight, The witness described the object's movement as zig-zagging at times, The witness felt it was not a conventional aircraft and was something out of the ordinary.
sighted object: a round, bright object that looked similar to the sun
